languages.text: "Вы на пороге великого открытия для всего Дома Орселлио. Пригласить с собой Регента было бы разумным поступком".

traits.locale_text: "Вы на пороге великого открытия для всего Дома Орселлио, и при этом не желаете звать с собой регента?"

languages.text: "You are standing on the cusp of a great discovery for all of House Orsellio. Inviting the regent seems like the sensible thing to do."
languages.original_text: "Вы на пороге великого открытия для всего Дома Орселлио. Пригласить с собой Регента было бы разумным поступком".

traits.locale_text: "You are standing on the cusp of a great discovery for all of House Orsellio. Inviting the regent seems like the sensible thing to do."
"You are standing on the cusp of a great discovery for all of House Orsellio. Inviting the regent seems like the sensible thing to do."

"You are standing on the cusp of a great discovery for all of House Orsellio. Inviting the regent seems like the sensible thing to do."

languages.text: 「君はオーセリオ家全員のために偉大な発見をしようとしている。摂政を招くのが賢明だと思う」
languages.original_text: "You are standing on the cusp of a great discovery for all of House Orsellio. Inviting the regent seems like the sensible thing to do."

traits.locale_text: 「君はオーセリオ家全員のために偉大な発見をしようとしている。摂政を招くのが賢明だと思う」

languages.text: “你可能会为奥赛罗家族带来重大发现。你此刻正站在风口浪尖上，邀请摄政王一同前往或许会是明智之举。”
languages.original_text: "You are standing on the cusp of a great discovery for all of House Orsellio. Inviting the regent seems like the sensible thing to do."

traits.locale_text: “你可能会为奥塞罗家族带来重大发现。你此刻正站在风口浪尖上，邀请摄政王一同前往或许会是明智之举。”

languages.text: « Vous êtes à deux doigts de résoudre un mystère qui touche toute la maison Orsellio. Inviter le régent ne serait sans doute pas une mauvaise idée. »
languages.original_text: "You are standing on the cusp of a great discovery for all of House Orsellio. Inviting the regent seems like the sensible thing to do."

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes à deux doigts de résoudre un mystère qui touche toute la maison Orsellio. Inviter le régent ne serait sans doute pas une mauvaise idée. »

languages.text: «Se halla en la cúspide de un descubrimiento trascendental para toda la casa Orsellio. Invitar al regente me parece lo más sensato».
languages.original_text: "You are standing on the cusp of a great discovery for all of House Orsellio. Inviting the regent seems like the sensible thing to do."

traits.locale_text: «Se halla en la cúspide de un descubrimiento trascendental para toda la casa Orsellio. Invitar al regente me parece lo más sensato».

languages.text: "Ihr steht an der Schwelle einer großen Entdeckung für das gesamte Haus Orsellio. {mf|Den Regenten|Die Regentin} einzuladen erscheint angemessen."
languages.original_text: "You are standing on the cusp of a great discovery for all of House Orsellio. Inviting the regent seems like the sensible thing to do."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr steht an der Schwelle einer großen Entdeckung für das gesamte Haus Orsellio. {mf|Den Regenten|Die Regentin} einzuladen erscheint angemessen."

languages.text: "Orsellio Hanesi'nin tamamını ilgilendiren büyük bir keşfin eşiğindesin. Naibi çağırmak, en mantıklı hareket gibi duruyor."
languages.original_text: "You are standing on the cusp of a great discovery for all of House Orsellio. Inviting the regent seems like the sensible thing to do."

traits.locale_text: "Orsellio Hanesi'nin tamamını ilgilendiren büyük bir keşfin eşiğindesin. Naibi çağırmak, en mantıklı hareket gibi duruyor."
